title: PBI 1
description: Implement a natural language processing (NLP) algorithm to understand complex user queries.

title: PBI 2
description: Develop a response generation system that generates human-like and contextually relevant responses.

title: PBI 3
description: Implement translation system to enable ChatGPT to comprehend and generate text in multiple languages.

title: PBI 4
description: Implement a language switch functionality to allow users to switch between languages seamlessly.

title: PBI 5
description: Develop content structuring algorithms to help users generate content outlines and structures.

title: PBI 6
description: Implement brainstorming algorithms to assist users in generating ideas for articles, essays, or stories.

title: PBI 7
description: Develop writing assistance algorithms to help users draft and edit content, including grammar and style corrections.

title: PBI 8
description: Develop a problem-solving system to provide step-by-step guidance and explanations.

title: PBI 9
description: Implement problem analysis algorithms to analyze complex problems and provide alternative solutions or perspectives.
